Class Card

public class Card extends Object implements Serializable
Class used to represent the possible cards types

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(Card.Type type, int id)
      Construct a single card with is type and a unique ID (for the type)
      Parameters:
      type - is the actual type of the card (a value from the enumeration)
      id - is the integer used to identify the card (unique for each type)
